price: تاسي د هغو خلكو ځوځات (اولاده) ياست چې موږ له نوح سره په بېړۍ كې سپاره كړي وو، او نوح يو شكر كوونكى بنده و.
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَبۡدٗا شَكُورٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyata man ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin innahu kāna ʿabdan shakūran
